name: Forever Ninja
description:
#lowrezjam 2022 entry

Controls:
- Arrow keys to move
- Space to jump (double jump)

Mobile:
- Onscreen controls

3 Levels (progressively harder) + Boss level (difficult)

Forever Ninja was developed as part of the LOWREZJAM 2022 in 14 days and had a limitation of making a game in 64x64 pixels. The optional theme chosen was "The sun is your enemy".

The game has been zoomed up from 64px so you can play it :) 

ENJOY!
